remarks: Technical lemma for ~ bnj60 .  This lemma may no longer be used or have become an indirect lemma of the theorem in question (i.e. a lemma of a lemma... of the theorem).  (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: bnj1318 $p |- ( X = Y -> _trCl ( X , A , R ) = _trCl ( Y , A , R ) ) $.
